com.msx7.core.command
类 AbstractHttpCommand

java.lang.Object
  com.msx7.core.command.AbstractBaseCommand
      com.msx7.core.command.AbstractCommand
          com.msx7.core.command.AbstractHttpCommand
所有已实现的接口：
ICommand
直接已知子类：
HttpGetCommand, HttpJsonPostCommand
public abstract class AbstractHttpCommand
extends AbstractCommand

 Steps:
 1. Prepare - Initialize headers. Sub-classes can override this method parse
 request etc
 2. onBeforeExecute:
 2.1. Get the URI
 2.2. Get HTTP command
 2.3. Add request to headers
 2.4. onBeforeExecute(HttpRequestBase) -- Can add body and other
 headers if need be etc
 3. go:
 3.1. Instantiate HttpClient 3.2. Execute the client using
 http-request
 3.3. Validate the response (200)
 3.4. If valid, getSuccessResponse(HttpResponse) or else
 #getErrorResponse(Exception) or
 getErrorResponse(HttpResponse) 
 3.5. Set the response
 4. onAfterExecute:
 Nothing special to be done. And also, don't override
 AbstractBaseCommand.notifyListener(boolean) - let notification happen

作者：
Gaurav Vaish
